title: My classmates caught me having sex and now they’re telling the whole class. I don’t know what to do. I’ve been feeling nervous and sweaty for the past few days. What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Act like it’s not a big deal. As long as they can see it bothers you, they will continue to tease you. If you have a best friend, invite her to watch you get fucked, and when anyone teases you, your best friend can tell em she watches you have sex all the time.
